briefTitle: A Study Evaluating IL28B Polymorphism in Patients With HBeAg-Negative Chronic Hepatitis B Treated With Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a) in Study ML18253
officialTitle: Cross-sectional Multicenter Study Evaluating the IL28B Polymorphism in Patients With HBeAg-negative Chronic Hepatitis B Treated With Pegylated Interferon Alfa-2a in the Course of Peg.Be.Liver Study
summary: This cross-sectional multicenter study will evaluate the IL28B polymorphism in patients with HBeAg-negative chronic hepatitis B treated with Pegasys (peginterferon alfa-2a) in the predecessor ML18253 study. The study consists of a single visit where eligible patients will undergo a blood test for IL28B genotyping, with a phone follow-up 7 days after the visit.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Viral Response (SVR) Defined as HBV DNA â‰¤ 2000 IU/ml at IL28B Genotype rs12979860 at End of Follow-up (EoF)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: EoF, as defined in the predecessor study, was at 48 weeks after the end of treatment.
